prompt: Design a vibrant drawer menu page with a cream background and an orange app bar. The drawer should feature a header with a circular avatar (user icon), user name 'Liam Davis' in bold white, and email 'liam.davis@example.com' in light gray. Include a divider below the header, followed by menu items: Dashboard (dashboard icon), Profile (person outline icon), Settings (settings icon), Help (help outline icon), and Logout (logout icon). Use ListTiles with orange icons and bold text, adding a slight shadow effect to the drawer. The main content should display a centered welcome message in orange with a gray subtitle, and include a floating action button (plus icon) for adding content. Use Material Design with 16px padding and consistent spacing.
